城市配置影响欧洲的健康和可持续发展不同城市布局、人类健康和可持续性之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Urban-configuration-impacts-health-and-sustainability-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Urban-configuration-impacts-health-and-sustainability-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61b8d21a-62af-43e8-8815-fc9f66eb97bc Fri, 05 Jul 2024 08:20:00 -0400 Urban configuration impacts health and sustainability in Europe
多囊卵巢综合症与不良分娩结果的较高风险有关多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）与女性分娩结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/PCOS-linked-to-higher-risk-of-adverse-birth-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/PCOS-linked-to-higher-risk-of-adverse-birth-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f59827a-51b2-4e24-92d1-c3d357b7e35e Fri, 05 Jul 2024 07:01:00 -0400 PCOS linked to higher risk of adverse birth outcomes
大流行期间印度新生儿低出生体重激增2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行对印度低出生体重 (LBW) 发生率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Pandemic-period-sees-spike-in-low-birth-weight-among-newborns-in-India.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Pandemic-period-sees-spike-in-low-birth-weight-among-newborns-in-India.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46c52c4b-f029-4223-9f7e-35f6e18f121d Fri, 05 Jul 2024 06:21:00 -0400 Pandemic period sees spike in low birth weight among newborns in India
硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白多糖被发现影响阿尔茨海默病的细胞病理学硫酸乙酰肝素修饰蛋白聚糖 (HSPG) 对阿尔茨海默病相关通路的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Heparan-sulfate-proteoglycans-found-to-influence-Alzheimers-cell-pathology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Heparan-sulfate-proteoglycans-found-to-influence-Alzheimers-cell-pathology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c4e4d72-553d-4f16-a327-04015fd523e0 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 05:23:00 -0400 Heparan-sulfate proteoglycans found to influence Alzheimer's cell pathology
久坐行为如何影响健康和生活质量研究人员探索不同领域的久坐行为对个人生活质量和福祉的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/How-sedentary-behavior-impacts-well-being-and-quality-of-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/How-sedentary-behavior-impacts-well-being-and-quality-of-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6ed704b-955e-42b0-b16b-c20107242c53 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 04:49:00 -0400 How sedentary behavior impacts well-being and quality of life
食物摄入的生物标志物：精准营养的关键研究人员研究了食物摄入生物标志物在客观和准确的饮食评估中的潜在效用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Biomarkers-of-food-intake-The-key-to- precision-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Biomarkers-of-food-intake-The-key-to- precision-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32be11a5-a7e4-401a-b1c1-7e9f3a4c20a2 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 04:37:00 -0400 Biomarkers of food intake: The key to precision nutrition
探索 PRM-A 作为抑制 SARS-CoV-2 的新型聚糖靶向疗法HIV、埃博拉病毒以及最近的 COVID-19 病毒对全世界的社会产生了巨大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Exploring-PRM-A-as-a-novel-glycan-targeted-therapy-for-SARS-CoV-2-inhibition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Exploring-PRM-A-as-a-novel-glycan-targeted-therapy-for-SARS-CoV-2-inhibition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7370f19-75f2-4935-bcff-a54e94d1b7a2 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 22:39:00 -0400 Exploring PRM-A as a novel glycan-targeted therapy for SARS-CoV-2 inhibition
创新研究揭示偏头痛机制和潜在疗法新研究首次描述了破坏波的传播和大脑中液体的流动如何引发头痛，详细说明了与先兆相关的神经系统症状与随后的偏头痛之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Innovative-research-sheds-light-on-migraine-mechanisms-and-pottial-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Innovative-research-sheds-light-on-migraine-mechanisms-and-pottial-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48893238-c3d4-4e4b-b163-c2383f846300 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 22:19:36 -0400 Innovative research sheds light on migraine mechanisms and potential therapies
研究发现，健康的工作环境可降低工作场所伤害和疾病的成本本周发表的一项新研究表明，全球经济如何能够弥补每年因工伤和疾病造成的数十亿美元损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Healthy-work-environments-slash-costs-of-workplace-injuries-and-illnesses-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Healthy-work-environments-slash-costs-of-workplace-injuries-and-illnesses-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f35ec23-b430-4fc8-8adb-52e510d8e71b Thu, 04 Jul 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Healthy work environments slash costs of workplace injuries and illnesses, study finds
肠道细菌和 T 细胞的创新研究荣获 NOSTER 和科学微生物组奖在肠道中，数十种细菌对免疫系统产生不同的影响，进而影响我们的健康——抵御病原体、帮助消化食物，甚至可能影响行为。但查明哪些细菌发挥哪些作用一直具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Innovative-study-on-gut-bacteria-and-t-cells-wins-NOSTER-Science-Microbiome-Prize.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Innovative-study-on-gut-bacteria-and-t-cells-wins-NOSTER-Science-Microbiome-Prize.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dff597dd-b312-41af-ba5f-341aa458ee54 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 21:35:00 -0400 Innovative study on gut bacteria and T cells wins NOSTER & Science Microbiome Prize
